document.heading: Civil Marriage Dissolution Equality Clarification Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-183, the “Civil Marriage Dissolution Equality Clarification Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-793. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Oct. 7, 2014, and Oct 28, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Nov. 6, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-467 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-183 became effective on Mar. 10, 2015.
